text:
e="preserve">Norman "Lou" Allinger (April 6, 1928 – July 8, 2020) was an American organic and computational chemist. He was Distinguished Research Professor Emeritus of Chemistry at the University of Georgia (UGA) in Athens.
In 1992, he became a member of the National Academy of Sciences in 1992. He was born in Alameda, California.
Allinger died on July 8, 2020 at the age of 92.
